args.content:
import Mathlib

open Polynomial

/-- A placeholder for the Galois group of a polynomial. -/
constant Gal : Polynomial ℚ → Type _

/-- We assume the Galois group carries a group structure. -/
constant Gal_group : ∀ p : Polynomial ℚ, Group (Gal p)

/-- Predicate: the complex roots of a polynomial are expressible in terms of radicals. -/
constant roots_expressible_by_radicals : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: a given group (provided with a Group instance) is solvable. -/
constant IsSolvableGroup : ∀ (α : Type _) (_ : Group α), Prop

/-- Main statement (translation only, proof omitted):
    Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are
    expressible in terms of radicals iff G is solvable. -/
theorem galois_group_solvable_iff_roots_by_radicals (p : Polynomial ℚ) (hp : Irreducible p) :
  roots_expressible_by_radicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (Gal p) (Gal_group p) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Predicate saying a polynomial over Q is irreducible. (Placeholder name to avoid conflicts.) -/
constant irreducible_poly (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Prop

/-- The Galois group of a polynomial (placeholder). -/
constant Gal_of_poly (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Type _

/-- We assume the Galois group carries a Group structure (placeholder). -/
constant Gal_group_inst (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Group (Gal_of_poly p)

/-- Predicate: the complex roots of a polynomial are expressible in terms of radicals. -/
constant roots_expressible_by_radicals (p : Polynomial ℚ) : Prop

/-- Predicate: a given group (with a Group instance) is solvable. -/
constant is_solvable_group (G : Type _) [Group G] : Prop

/-- Main statement (translation only, proof omitted):
    Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are
    expressible in terms of radicals iff G is solvable. -/
theorem galois_group_solvable_iff_roots_by_radicals (p : Polynomial ℚ) (hp : irreducible_poly p) :
  roots_expressible_by_radicals p ↔ is_solvable_group (Gal_of_poly p) := by sorry

constant is_solvable_group : Type _ → Prop

/-- Main statement (translation only; proof omitted):
    Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are

args.content:
import Mathlib

universe u

/-- The Galois group of a polynomial over Q (placeholder). -/
constant Gal : Polynomial ℚ → Type u

/-- A group instance on the Galois group (placeholder). -/
constant Gal_group : ∀ p : Polynomial ℚ, Group (Gal p)

/-- Predicate: the complex roots of a polynomial are expressible in terms of radicals (placeholder). -/
constant roots_expressible_by_radicals : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: a polynomial over Q is irreducible (placeholder). -/
constant irreducible_poly : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: a given group (with an explicit Group instance) is solvable (placeholder). -/
constant IsSolvableGroup : ∀ (G : Type u) (inst : Group G), Prop

/-- Main statement (translation only, proof omitted):
    Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are
    expressible in terms of radicals iff G is a solvable group. -/
theorem galois_group_solvable_iff_roots_by_radicals (p : Polynomial ℚ) (hp : irreducible_poly p) :
  roots_expressible_by_radicals p ↔ IsSolvableGroup (Gal p) (Gal_group p) := by sorry

import Mathlib

universe u

/-- Placeholder: the Galois group of a polynomial over Q. -/
constant my_Gal : Polynomial ℚ → Type u

/-- Placeholder: group instance on the Galois group. -/
constant my_Gal_group : ∀ p : Polynomial ℚ, Group (my_Gal p)

/-- Predicate: the complex roots of a polynomial are expressible in terms of radicals. -/
constant my_roots_expressible_by_radicals : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: a polynomial over Q is irreducible (placeholder). -/
constant my_irreducible_poly : Polynomial ℚ → Prop

/-- Predicate: a given group (with an explicit Group instance) is solvable (placeholder). -/
constant my_is_solvable_group : ∀ (G : Type u), Group G → Prop

/-- Main statement (translation only, proof omitted):
    Let p(x) be an irreducible polynomial with rational coefficients, and let
    G = Gal(p) be its Galois group. Then the complex roots of p(x) are
    expressible in terms of radicals iff G is a solvable group. -/
theorem galois_group_solvable_iff_roots_by_radicals (p : Polynomial ℚ) (hp : my_irreducible_poly p) :
  my_roots_expressible_by_radicals p ↔ my_is_solvable_group (my_Gal p) (my_Gal_group p) := by sorry
